name: CyberrOver
description:
这是一款俯视角射击游戏，你将使用WASD操控角色，通过鼠标左键进行射击消灭怪物通关。

当UI左上角的方块图标变为黄色时，可使用左Shift键进行Dash操作；

当准星的图标黄色区块填满目准星变成红色时，可长按右键进入”RootTime”，在这个模式下，你可以通过鼠标左键点选生命值40%以下的敌人(Tips: 血量条变为黄色) 骇入它，变成它的样子继续消灭怪物。

不用担心，当你变身的敌人死后，你还能变回你自己。

以上便是游戏的操作说明，祝您游玩愉快!

This is a top-down shooting game. You will control the character and shoot with the left mouse button to eliminate monsters and pass the level.

When the square icon in the upper left corner of the UI turns yellow, you can use the left Shift key to perform Dash operations;

When the yellow block of the front sight icon is filled and the front sight turns red, you can press and hold the right button to enter "Root Time". gauge bar turns yellow) Hack it, change into its appearance and continue to destroy monsters. Don't worry, when the enemy you transform dies, you can still transform back into yourself.

The above is the operation instruction of the game, I wish you a happy playing!
